meanings.definition: Grass that has been cut or mown.
meanings.sent1: The fresh smell of cutgrass filled the air after the lawn was mowed.
meanings.sent2: The baseball field was covered in cutgrass clippings after the groundskeeper finished mowing.
meanings.sent3: The cutgrass whispered secrets to the daisies growing nearby.
meanings.sent4: The cutgrass lay like a soft green carpet under the summer sun.
meanings.sent5: The children played tag, their laughter mixing with the scent of cutgrass.

meanings.sent1: Dad will cutgrass in the backyard this weekend to keep it neat.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used a machine to cutgrass efficiently in the large field.
meanings.sent3: As the lawnmower hummed, it seemed to dance with the cutgrass.
meanings.sent4: She cutgrass with precision, making sure every blade was the same length.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the scissors cutting the paper mimicked the rhythm of cutting cutgrass.
